events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The supply chain of EV batteries involves the extraction, processing, and recycling of critical materials such as cobalt. This complex chain includes multiple stages and participants to ensure the availability of these materials for battery production.
events.description: The supply chain of EV batteries involves the extraction, processing, and recycling of critical materials such as cobalt. This complex chain includes multiple stages and participants to ensure the availability of these materials for battery production.

events.name: cobalt extraction
events.wd_description: Cobalt extraction involves mining operations predominantly in the DRC, which is the main source of cobalt. The extraction methods include both artisanal and large-scale mining.
events.description: Cobalt extraction involves mining operations predominantly in the DRC, which is the main source of cobalt. The extraction methods include both artisanal and large-scale mining.

events.name: artisanal mining
events.wd_description: Artisanal mining is a small-scale method often regulated to ensure conflict-free sourcing and minimize human rights violations.
events.description: Artisanal mining is a small-scale method often regulated to ensure conflict-free sourcing and minimize human rights violations.

events.name: mining regulation
events.wd_description: The DRC government has implemented regulations to control artisanal mining activities and ensure they are conducted legally and ethically.
events.description: The DRC government has implemented regulations to control artisanal mining activities and ensure they are conducted legally and ethically.

events.name: conflict-free validation
events.wd_description: The validation of mining sites as conflict-free involves inspections and certifications to prevent the use of minerals that fund conflicts.
events.description: The validation of mining sites as conflict-free involves inspections and certifications to prevent the use of minerals that fund conflicts.

events.name: large-scale mining
events.wd_description: Large-scale mining operations in the DRC and other regions involve significant infrastructure and technology to extract cobalt efficiently.
events.description: Large-scale mining operations in the DRC and other regions involve significant infrastructure and technology to extract cobalt efficiently.

events.name: mining companies
events.wd_description: Large mining companies operate extensive cobalt extraction projects, often involving international investments and partnerships.
events.description: Large mining companies operate extensive cobalt extraction projects, often involving international investments and partnerships.

events.name: mining technology
events.wd_description: Advanced technology is employed in large-scale mining to improve efficiency and reduce environmental impact.
events.description: Advanced technology is employed in large-scale mining to improve efficiency and reduce environmental impact.

events.name: cobalt processing
events.wd_description: The processing of cobalt involves refining and purification to produce high-purity cobalt suitable for use in EV batteries. This stage includes both hydrometallurgical and pyrometallurgical methods.
events.description: The processing of cobalt involves refining and purification to produce high-purity cobalt suitable for use in EV batteries. This stage includes both hydrometallurgical and pyrometallurgical methods.

events.name: hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Hydrometallurgy involves using aqueous solutions to extract cobalt from its ores, often through leaching and solvent extraction.
events.description: Hydrometallurgy involves using aqueous solutions to extract cobalt from its ores, often through leaching and solvent extraction.

events.name: leaching
events.wd_description: The leaching process uses chemicals to dissolve cobalt from its ores, creating a solution that can be further processed.
events.description: The leaching process uses chemicals to dissolve cobalt from its ores, creating a solution that can be further processed.

events.name: solvent extraction
events.wd_description: Solvent extraction involves separating cobalt from other metals in the solution through selective solvent processes.
events.description: Solvent extraction involves separating cobalt from other metals in the solution through selective solvent processes.

events.name: pyrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Pyrometallurgy uses high temperatures to smelt and refine cobalt, separating it from impurities.
events.description: Pyrometallurgy uses high temperatures to smelt and refine cobalt, separating it from impurities.

events.name: smelting furnaces
events.wd_description: Smelting furnaces are used to melt cobalt ores, enabling the separation of cobalt from other materials based on melting points.
events.description: Smelting furnaces are used to melt cobalt ores, enabling the separation of cobalt from other materials based on melting points.

events.name: refining agents
events.wd_description: Refining agents are added during pyrometallurgy to remove impurities and produce high-purity cobalt.
events.description: Refining agents are added during pyrometallurgy to remove impurities and produce high-purity cobalt.

events.name: cobalt recycling
events.wd_description: Cobalt recycling involves recovering cobalt from used batteries and other products to reintroduce it into the supply chain, supporting a circular economy.
events.description: Cobalt recycling involves recovering cobalt from used batteries and other products to reintroduce it into the supply chain, supporting a circular economy.

events.name: battery recycling
events.wd_description: Battery recycling processes aim to recover cobalt and other valuable metals from spent EV batteries, involving collection, dismantling, and material recovery.
events.description: Battery recycling processes aim to recover cobalt and other valuable metals from spent EV batteries, involving collection, dismantling, and material recovery.

events.name: collection systems
events.wd_description: Effective collection systems are necessary to gather used EV batteries from consumers and transport them to recycling facilities.
events.description: Effective collection systems are necessary to gather used EV batteries from consumers and transport them to recycling facilities.

events.name: dismantling facilities
events.wd_description: Dismantling facilities safely disassemble batteries to separate components and prepare them for material recovery.
events.description: Dismantling facilities safely disassemble batteries to separate components and prepare them for material recovery.

events.name: material recovery processes
events.wd_description: Material recovery processes extract valuable metals like cobalt from battery components through various techniques.
events.description: Material recovery processes extract valuable metals like cobalt from battery components through various techniques.

events.name: scrap metal recycling
events.wd_description: Recycling of cobalt-containing scrap metals from various industries to recover cobalt for reuse in the supply chain.
events.description: Recycling of cobalt-containing scrap metals from various industries to recover cobalt for reuse in the supply chain.

events.name: scrap collection
events.wd_description: Collecting cobalt-containing scrap from industrial processes and consumer products.
events.description: Collecting cobalt-containing scrap from industrial processes and consumer products.

events.name: metal recovery
events.wd_description: Processes to extract cobalt from scrap metals, including melting and refining techniques.
events.description: Processes to extract cobalt from scrap metals, including melting and refining techniques.
